00056 bool TimePeriod::dateInPeriod(TimeStamp ts) {
00057     if (ts > beginTimeStamp && ts < endTimeStamp)
00058         return true;
00059     else
00060         return false;
00061 }
00062 
00069 bool TimePeriod::dateInPeriod(time_t ts) {
00070     if (beginTimeStamp < ts && endTimeStamp > ts)
00071         return true;
00072     else
00073         return false;
00074 }

00100 string TimePeriod::toString(bool shortString) {
00101     return string("From : " + beginTimeStamp.toString(shortString)
00102                                         + ", To   : " + endTimeStamp.toString(shortString) +" ");
